p: Spatial differences in the proportion of Ae. albopictus feeding on selected host species between the counties was compared by using Pearsons χ 2 analysis for trend. All analyses were performed using IBM SPSS Statistics 21 (IBM, Armonk, NY, USA). Confidence intervals surrounding the estimated proportion of blood meals taken from a given species were calculated using the formula 95% CI = ±1.96×(square root p (1− p)/n), where p = the proportion of blood meals from a given source, and n = the total number of blood meals identified [59].
